item.title: Ship: Precursor
item.description: Ship: Precursor Lead by the scientist [Mark Dubois](../characters/mark_dubois.html), the Precursor is under the flag of the company [Arstir Industries](../factions/arstir_industries.html). Background The ship left earth 2154 to get more detailed informations if life is really possible on the planet [Vetoo 581d](../planets/vetoo_581d.html). The science crew assigned to it managed to...
